ValidationRule.description: The Credit Decision must be Accepted or Pending approval in order to enter an Authorised credit limit.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Credit_Authorised_Limit__c > 0, NOT(TEXT(Credit_Decision__c) = "Accepted"), NOT(TEXT(Credit_Decision__c) = "Pending Approval"), From_Radius__c = FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Credit Decision must be "Accepted" or "Pending Approval" in order to enter an Authorised credit limit.
